The large, well designed kitchen, ideal for informal dining and casual get together, was renovated in 2010-2011.It  features a wall-of-windows, large island as well as ample counter space and storage.  From the kitchen, steps lead down to a patio and a fenced garden with raised vegetable beds - perfect spot for al fresco dining  The second floor has 5 bedrooms, four baths, including recently remodeled master bath. On the third floor, in addition to two more bedrooms and two baths, there is a special bonus - a dramatic oval shaped billiard room in the turreted dormer. Schools, T stops, Reservoir Park are close by.
